briefdescription.para: Child Task Initialization Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked during FM application startup initialization to create and initialize the FM Child Task. The purpose for the child task is to process FM application commands that take too long to execute within the main task.

briefdescription.para: Child Task Entry Point Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is the entry point for the FM application child task. The function registers with CFE as a child task, creates the semaphore to interface with the parent task and calls the child task main loop function. Should the main loop function return due to a breakdown in the interface handshake with the parent task, this function will self delete as a child task with CFE. There is no return from CFE_ES_DeleteChildTask.
CFE_ES_DeleteChildTask, FM_ChildLoop

briefdescription.para: Child Task Main Loop Processor Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is the main loop for the FM application child task. The function waits indefinitely for the parent task to grant the handshake semaphore, which is the signal that there are fresh command arguments in the child task handshake queue. The function will remain in this loop until the child task is terminated by the CFE, or until a fatal error occurs which causes the child task to terminate itself. Fatal errors are defined as any error returned by OS_CountSemTake or if the handshake queue is empty, or if the read index for the handshake queue is invalid.
FM_ChildQueueEntry_t, FM_ChildProcess

briefdescription.para: Child Task Command Queue Processor Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function routes control to the appropriate child task command handler. After the command handler has finished, this function then updates the queue access variables to point to the next queue entry.
FM_ChildQueueEntry_t, FM_ChildTask

briefdescription.para: Child Task Copy File Command Handler.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked when the FM child task has been granted the child task handshake semaphore and the child task command queue contains arguments that signal a copy file command.

parameterdescription.para: - A pointer to an entry in the child task handshake command queue which contains the arguments necessary to process this command.

simplesect.para: FM_ChildQueueEntry_t, #FM_Copy, FM_CopyFileCmd_t

parameterdescription.para: - A pointer to an entry in the child task handshake command queue which contains the arguments necessary to process this command.

simplesect.para: FM_ChildQueueEntry_t, FM_SetPermCmd_t

briefdescription.para: Child Task Get Dir List to File Initialization Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the output file and then writes both the CFE file header and a blank copy of the directory list statistics structure to the output file. At the end of the command, software will re-write the statistics structure, this time with up to date values.

parameterdescription.para: - A pointer to a file handle variable which is modified to contain the newly created output file handle.
- A pointer to a buffer containing the directory name.
- A pointer to a buffer containing the output filename.

simplesect.para: #FM_GetDirFile

memberdef.argsstring: (os_dirp_t DirPtr, int32 FileHandle, char *Directory, char *DirWithSep, char *Filename, uint8 GetSizeTimeMode)
memberdef.name: FM_ChildDirListFileLoop

briefdescription.para: Child Task Get Dir List to File Loop Processor Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads each directory entry, determines the last modify time size and mode for each entry, and writes the entry data to the output file.

parameterdescription.para: - Directory pointer, a handle used to read directory entries.
- Output file handle.
- Pointer to a buffer containing the directory name.
- Pointer to directory name with path separator appended.
- Pointer to a buffer containing the output filename.
- Option to call OS_stat for size, time, mode of files

simplesect.para: #FM_GetDirFile

briefdescription.para: Child Task File Size Time and Mode Utility Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked to query the last modify time, current size and mode (permissions) for each directory entry when processing either the Get Directory List to File or Get Directory List to Packet commands.

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to the combined directory and entry names.
- Pointer to the number containing the current entry size.
- Pointer to the number containing the last modify time.
- Pointer to the value containing the mode (permissions).

simplesect.para: #FM_GetDirFile, #FM_GetDirPkt

briefdescription.para: Child Task Sleep and Stat Utility Function.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is invoked to query the last modify time, current size and mode (permissions) for each directory entry when processing either the Get Directory List to File or Get Directory List to Packet commands. However it only will sleep if FM_CHILD_STAT_SLEEP_FILECOUNT reaches zero and call FM_ChildSizeTimeMode if getSizeTimeMode is TRUE, otherwise this function has no effect

parameterdescription.para: - Pointer to the combined directory and entry names.
- Pointer to the data containing the current entry size, last modify time, and mode
- If this is zero the function will sleep for FM_CHILD_STAT_SLEEP_MS and reset it to FM_CHILD_STAT_SLEEP_FILECOUNT. Otherwise it will subtract 1
- Whether this function should call FM_ChildSizeTimeMode

simplesect.para: #FM_GetDirFile, #FM_GetDirPkt
